title: Zrak chiméry (svitek)
content:
Zrak chiméry

"Notes containing the formula for a potion made using a Oko chiméry. The potion grants 1 Bronze Talent when consumed."

This potion can only be made using the eye of a chiméra.

Zápisy do Deníku

Receptury: Zrak chiméry

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
100  	20  




Lokace
Vesemir, v Prologu
